class_notes:
This course meets during the first half of the semester. Prerequisite: EPI 530 or 504.  Cross-listed with GH 562.
 This is a 7 Week 1 Session Course.  Please see RSPH Academic Calendar for condensed A/D/S and Grading Status Change Deadlines.
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 504, or EPI 530, or co-requisite.  To provide training in the domestic and international public health aspects of tuberculosis; its epidemiology and diagnosis, the theory and practice of treatment, and means of prevention in developed and developing countries; and the interaction between HIV and tuberculosis.  Cross-listed with GH 562.
sections: Class Nbr: 3417, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 10-11:50a, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
